title: Client patching issues.
body: Hi, recently I've been trying to patch the League client on both the beta and legacy clients, but on both they always seem to fail. I've tried re-installing league multiple times, and sometimes i even get a blue screen. I've tried to fix this for about a week but with no luck I've run out of options. I'm hoping a rioter can shed some light on what i could do, as i've followed nearly every step in the trouble-shooting guide.  Hopefully someone has a solution, Thanks.

replies.body: Where does the patcher seem to fail during the process and when you say blue screen, do you mean a windows blue screen or the client is just a blank screen?
I just wanted to give this a bump hoping i can get a response from riot.
